name: Red Apple Blitz
preparation: Fill a shaker with ice. Add vodka and apple juice. Shake well until chilled. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with Red Bull. Stir gently to mix.
backstory: Designed for those who like their nights long and their drinks strong, the Red Apple Blitz combines sweet apple with the energizing kick of Red Bull, topped off with a potent shot of vodka.
